nodes.text: The Union was a model of speeder bike produced by Prinawe during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Prinawe Union was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan as a reward for those who attended the Community Cantina Tour at New York Comic-Con in October 2015. The fifth and last in a series of Cantina Tour rewards, the Union is shareable by players; they can give codes to other players so they can acquire the mount themselves.
